lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: Estou com uma loja online de calçados e não tenho o valor inicial para começar o negócio.
lenders.occupational_info: Loja online  de venda de calçados para todas as idades.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: ... it works.
lenders.occupational_info: My work helps my boss do his work. of financial/investment consulting  I arrange travel, pay the bills ... plus a whole host of other miscellaneous things that keep me busy and my job interesting.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people start and expand their businesses. I know what its like to not have enough money to do everything you'd like to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with engineers at my company and and manufacturers around the USA. I help find suppliers for office furniture components.

lenders.name: Siva
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who work hard to earn a living.

lenders.name: Ritu
lenders.loan_because: I want to help woman around the world create a better life for themselves and their families
lenders.occupational_info: My job is extremely rewarding because I help people by making sure that they have access to the medications that they need.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I want to show my children that a small contribution for me can make a big difference to somebody else.

lenders.name: Csilla
lenders.loan_because: I want to give to those who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: office job

lenders.name: Charline
lenders.loan_because: I can:) Every little bit helps!

lenders.name: Seema
lenders.loan_because: because i love the fact that by pooling our resources we can all make the world a better place for those who need a helping hand, however small it may be.
lenders.occupational_info: i keep track of money for a big healthcare provider in virginia

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the life-changing effects of small loans first hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites.

lenders.name: Kai
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy to support such a great idea as microlending. This idea has the potential to improve our world and can give efficent support to people in developing countries.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Someone needs it more than me.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of human beings to strive to better their own life and the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student seeking a degree in business.  I have started my own non-profit organization that  gives money to help other students like myself.  When I graduate I want to start other businesses and some day be a major lender to people with bright ideas.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like having a direct connection to the party that funds are lent to, I like getting feedback on how my modest contributions have contributed to the borrowers' success, and it makes me more aware of the challenges faced by people in parts of the world that i know very little about.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We all have dreams and goals and to succeed and accomplish is a beautiful feeling. I believe this feeling is a right and not a privelage. I believe that economic circumstance should not hinder a person who has the drive and passion to go to the next level. I would like to help those achieve what all of us essentially strive to achieve.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I know how tough running a business is
lenders.occupational_info: I own a health food store/laundromat, and also work nights putting sports pages together for newspapers

lenders.name: Maia
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone should be given the chance to earn a decent living , and sometimes all they need is a small push to get them rolling
lenders.occupational_info: I help to get the newest medical technologies tested and made available to those who need them.

lenders.name: Maria
James
lenders.loan_because: It just feels like the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Earlham College. I'm studying Music and Computer Science, but I'm still unsure as to what I am going to do with my life.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: When I make a loan, I'm not just investing money.  I find that I become interested in the person who receives the loan, their business, their family, their part of the world.  It enriches me, and expands my horizons.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people who program computers.

lenders.name: katherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people change their worlds, as I have received help to change my own. I could not have started my business without the support of others.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: it is good to feel that with the little extra that you have you can help someone take a big step towards a better future.

lenders.name: Kevin Miles
lenders.loan_because: It's a great, direct way to help people.  and watch it change someone's quality of life.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: My main goal on Kiva is to help female artists.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: We are all that we have.  We must help each other get on our feet.  We have to reach out to those less fortunate than we are, who have a dream, and aspire to make a better life for themselves. We must take a chance on each other that good still exists in the world, and that we to can have an impact. Our legacy is those we helped, and lives we touched along the way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a marketing manager for a large constuction company, and working on my B.S in Nursing.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: My giving is based on a simple formula: "I love because God first loved me" plus "As you do it unto the least of these you do it unto me" add "To whom much has been given much is required" = Giving to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Employee Assistance Counselor working with businesses and non-profits.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: I've been extraordinarily lucky, and consider it an honor to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books and short stories.

lenders.name: Arnie, Kelli and Nathan
lenders.loan_because: We have been so fortunate and want to assist others
lenders.occupational_info: We own and operate a book and gift store

lenders.name: hedningarna
lenders.loan_because: The small and remote Bouvetøya [Bouvet Island] also want to take part in developping the world - and started to loan with microcredits.

lenders.name: CS Management
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it allows us to learn about elements of management in concrete ways. Our funds come from our local SIFE - Students in Free Enterprise organization.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students studying management at a two-year college in Cincinnati, OH.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help small businesses, particularly those run by women, succeed.

lenders.name: Samuel and Janice
lenders.loan_because: we believe that people everywhere should have the opportunity to pursue their goals for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both pastors servicng Christian congregtions in the US.

lenders.name: Inness
lenders.loan_because: rejoice!!!

lenders.name: Muhammad Rashid
lenders.loan_because: To  grow my business. And through that income I can build house for my family.
lenders.occupational_info: I m a farmer. Breeding cows and buffaloes. Through loan I want to increase my animals number. So the production of milk increase and i get more profit.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: God made a world of abundance... there is more than enough for everybody is each person only takes the share of it that they truly need...
lenders.occupational_info: to recognize that we are ALL in relationship with one another.... we are all connected.   Once we recognize this basic tenet, how we live will change.   It is only when I recognize my brother, my sister, in need, will I step up and do the right thing.   We are one.

lenders.name: Regan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way to help others establish themselves financially.  It is a pleasure to give!
lenders.occupational_info: I am semi-retired.  I am a land development consultant and land surveyor.

lenders.name: Arad
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the model and want to help others.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: A hand up is better than a hand out

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to help make the world a better place and this seems like a great way  to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: My passion lies in photography, philanthropy, wildlife and conservation.

lenders.name: Rani
lenders.loan_because: I have witnessed the miracles that a conduit for entrepreneurship and innovation can achieve for people with little hope, even in the midst of turmoil. This is the universal language: the ability to realize one’s dreams and creations. Without a supportive network and a means to achieve these goals, countless entrepreneurs will surely face further disenfranchisement and despair in a world facing increasingly complex social and economic challenges.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I believe small business success generates a way out of poverty for the owners as well as others around them.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I'm at a point where I can, and I'd like to make a difference.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: i dep--eely care about less fortunate poeple
lenders.occupational_info: s

lenders.name: International Club
lenders.loan_because: As the International Club of University of Portland, we want to reach out to the rest of the world by helping communities continue to grow.  Each academic year, we fundraise hundreds of dollars to support developing economies specifically in areas that our students call home.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of international and US students that represent 32 different countries.  We promote friendship, mutual understanding, and acceptance among persons from various cultural backgrounds within our community. We encourage justice, unity, and peace by organizing social and philanthropic activities.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: It's fascinating and fun to follow the progress made with such a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English woman managing a small convenience store/gas station owned by two Indian men in The USA. We are truly an international outfit despite being small! The store is open 24/7. Our receipts are $3500 - $ $200 daily. The store is run by myself, an assistant manager, 2 full time cashiers and 2 part time cashiers. Besides gas/petrol, diesel and kerosene/parafin, we sell hot and cold beverages, candy, snacks, groceries, auto supplies, cigarettes, prepaid cell phone minutes, moneygrams and lottery tickets. We do not sell alcohol. We take cash, checks, travellers checks,  credit and debit cards.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to be Canadian and want everyone to have the chances that I get
lenders.occupational_info: I go to elementry school in Canada

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I have a cousin who was adopted from Ethiopia and think it's really cool what this orginization is doing, and it makes sense!
lenders.occupational_info: I learn stuff that I (hopefully) will using later in life...

lenders.name: Mona
lenders.loan_because: It's a very good idea.  My friends invited me and I intend to continue lending after the loan is paid.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: This is the solution which will end the hideous gap between rich and poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead active travel tours all over the world, currently specializing in the Pacific Northwest of the United States.  More relevantly, I am an entrepreneur trying to start my own travel company with microfinance as a component.

lenders.name: Mimi, Diana & Pati
lenders.loan_because: The True joy of Life is to help others, and by doing so you will truly feel ALIVE!!
lenders.occupational_info: It is so rewarding for us to help those in need.  Helping others helps to put things into perspective!

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed at their work.
lenders.occupational_info: I write programs for computers and small devices.  The programs tell the devices what to do and how to do it.

lenders.name: Jolley Family
lenders.loan_because: we are a family that has received many blessings and we would like to help bless the lives of others
lenders.occupational_info: I create colorful, eye-catching images for companies to use on their computers.  I also create web pages so companies can share their ideas via the internet.

lenders.name: Markell
lenders.loan_because: We all deserve a chance to achieve our dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I am am real estate investor/developer

lenders.name: Marin
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an undergraduate student at the University of South Carolina, studying international business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe the majority of people don't want handouts or to feel they can't make it on their own.  I truly think many just need a little helping hand to get them on the path to making it on their own.  Kiva appears to be a vehicle to help make that happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and implement website applications.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I want to support their passion and their drive to move forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide investment opportunities to individuals and companies across the world.

lenders.name: Jay & Mona
lenders.loan_because: GIVE a person a fish and you feed the family for a day.  TEACH the person to fish and feed the family every day.  Our loans help TEACH the value of capitalism while helping improve the borrower's quality of life.

lenders.name: B.J. Spamer
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a U.S. non-profit organization, handling cases of long-term missing and unidentified deceased children.

lenders.name: Kyle Baer
lenders.loan_because: This is a free market approach to enabling entrepreneurs in third world countries. By providing these countries with access to capital, we can help them improve their infrastructure and create sustainable enterprises.

lenders.name: YETI  Students
lenders.loan_because: We would like to share our blessings and use our money and talent to help people across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: We are high school students from St. Scholastica's College, Manila, Philippines. We raise funds by buying and selling wholesale products and we believe in making tithing a habit.

lenders.name: Philip Townsend
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate my entire life and now that I am retired, I want to do something tangible to help people in other parts of the world improve their standards of living on a basis that is sustainable.
lenders.occupational_info: I provided advice to businesses; large, medium and small to help them become more efficient, effective and successful.  I have travelled extensively around the world for both pleasure and business and this afforded me the opportunity to see that our basic needs are the same the world over.  Since retiring in June 2011, I do some consulting and am working on my first novel which I hope to have published in 2013 or 2014!

lenders.name: Martin & Debi
lenders.loan_because: We know what it is to be an entrepreneur and we want to help people realize their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Martin has a business renting recreational vehicles for vacations.  Debi is a nurse practitioner caring for older people who live in nursing homes.

lenders.name: JoandDoug
lenders.loan_because: i want to help
lenders.occupational_info: i do research and writing for a business

lenders.name: Noel
lenders.loan_because: it's  a great feeling to be helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage commercial properties

lenders.name: Sarah & Ed
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lenders.name: beth, jesse & lani
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's a great way to get kids to participate and understand that we all have a responsibility to help others in any and every way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a motion picture studio.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: The cost to me is much less than the benefit to those who are receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: Construction project management (buildings).

lenders.name: Samira
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a teacher, but currently stay at home to raise my 2 children.

lenders.name: Michele, Falmouth,MA
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children ages 5-11 years old who have learning or behavior problems.

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.occupation: Medical Practice Manager and Arbonne Consultant

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in a very low income city and I am very blessed to have the opportunity now at my age to help others that are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell health insurance

lenders.name: Jo M
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get financing, even for a small business in the U.S. with good credit. I have spent time in the Russian republic (Far East), although not in Tajikistan, and I know how difficult it is to start a business there. I hope I can make a small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping businesses get stories in newspapers and magazines and on radio and television shows.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctoral candidate in Christian Ethics, focusing on HIV/AIDS and women.

lenders.name: Jennica
lenders.loan_because: God blessed me financially... I'm thankful for the opportunity to help!

lenders.name: Jason & Fayellen
lenders.loan_because: We want to help without being condescending; which we feel a lot of organizations are. Just giving feels good to the giver but not always for the receiver. Kiva allows people to ask for help with dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: We both hold degrees in multimedia design (we do things like news graphics and websites) and we're both artists; he in oils & pencil and me in watercolors/inks & photos.

lenders.name: Hsiao FY
lenders.loan_because: It's so wonderful that I can help someone else.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I'm optimistic enough to believe that I can make a positive difference to someones life and its feels pretty damn good too.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help my clients market themselves on the internet mainly through search engines. I also work on helping my clients improve their websites for their customers.

lenders.name: Anna Ryden
lenders.whereabouts: Barra da Tijuca Rio de Janeiro
lenders.loan_because: I hope that KIVA loans can make a real difference.
lenders.occupational_info: thousand different projects...

lenders.name: aires
lenders.loan_because: To invest in products of better quality
lenders.occupational_info: My  desktop is where I call to get the products of nutrition internal and external, for the benefit of health.

lenders.name: Merete
lenders.loan_because: I belive this works!

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others have the opportunity to help themselves. We all need a "hand up" sometimes

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Help and Hope are Essential.

lenders.name: Erick
lenders.loan_because: Over the years I have been given "breaks" in life. Just returning the favors given me.
lenders.occupational_info: A means to an end. I work my current job in hopes of reaching my dreams. I hope those I help are doing the same, reaching for their dreams.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a perfect way to help our  fellow beings
lenders.occupational_info: Administration

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: it would be great, if people could improve their life  with a little help ...

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: ERIN
lenders.loan_because: IT MAKES ME FEEL GOOD HELPING OTHER PEOPLE. WE ALL NEED EACH OTHER.

lenders.name: The Hill Family
lenders.loan_because: We decided as a family to make a loan and follow the progress.  We are lucky in our lives, and want to do something to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Worldwide traveler assistance.

lenders.name: Schmidtgall
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: I cant loan.  I need to have someone pay off my educational loans.  Is there anybody to help me?

lenders.name: Ed M
lenders.loan_because: I'm interested in how the micro lending business works
lenders.occupational_info: Chair the Board of a local philanthropic organization focused on early childhood development programs

lenders.name: Rowells
lenders.loan_because: Once upon a time I needed an education so that I could support my family. At that time many people supported me and now it is my turn to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: Mom is a nurse that explains to people how to get healthier.

lenders.name: Karlyn & Arun
lenders.loan_because: We hope to give others the opportunity to achieve their goals and make their businesses successful.
lenders.occupational_info: Arun helps struggling businesses reorganize, plan their debt repayment, and stay open. Karlyn teaches English to immigrants.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I'm excited about  the opportunity to help people make a better life for themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I work with photos and help give them the "WOW" factor with my design templates.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an Intensive Care Unit at the biggest hospital in my large city. Using high technology and invasive monitoring techniques, I care for extremely ill patients. My patient population includes: medical, surgical, trauma, burns. My department takes only the sickest patients in the city! It's endlessly challenging and rewarding.

lenders.name: Pierce
lenders.loan_because: I am compelled to do my part to support others, to give them opportunities and tools to improve their lives and the lives of others in whatever way I can. I have great faith in the indomitable human spirit and trust that by giving just a little, the world will gain a lot.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an investment banking firm specializing in raising institutional or angel capital for small to medium sized businesses involved in everything from health care to alternative energy to movie production. I also do non-profit work for the Amani Childrens Foundation, which specializes in providing the best practice and care for children orphaned by HIV/AIDS in Kenya.

lenders.name: RenKonsult AS
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping people directly, and microfinance is an excellent way to achieve this.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a cleaning company in Arendal. We support internationally through KIVA and locally (arendal) through the woman crisis centre

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:35
lenders.occupational_info: I work with high school students.  My job ranges from helping students work through difficult situation at home or in their personal lives, as well as assisting them in choosing classes, goal setting, career planning, etc.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a fair chance at creating a livelihood.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me $50.00 to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people and businesses keep track of their finances, and pay their employees and taxes.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing opportunity to extend a helping hand -- to give someone a hand up, instead of a hand out. Exactly what our society needs!

lenders.name: Rosemary
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior at St. Anselm College.

lenders.name: Nadia
lenders.loan_because: There are few things more satisfying in life than helping others help themselves. With Kiva there is a direct connection to the people we help and, unlike giving to charities, we might get our money back and experience the pleasure of giving all over again.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to help toward a world with independent women!

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others create a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I find personnel for corporations.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is our duty to do something  to leave the world in a better place each day. This is my way of catching up.

lenders.name: French Family
lenders.loan_because: its our small part in improving global conditions
lenders.occupational_info: Develop & build wind farms for a greener world

lenders.name: Corinne
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to know that I can help even if it is just a little bit.
lenders.occupational_info: Managing various Social Media accounts and websites for my diverse clients!

lenders.name: Chris and Helen
lenders.loan_because: something so small to us can be so big to others.
lenders.occupational_info: network engineering

lenders.name: giancarlo
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: Arielle
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected, and I feel its my responsibility to share my resources.  I'm so thankful for everything I've been given, and I hope that other people are as well.
lenders.occupational_info: In the city I live in, there are many homeless people.  I'm work specifically with young people, because I'm young, and it might be easier for me to have a strong connection with them.  I help our clients find resources, go to doctors appointments, fill out paper work, and go on recreational field trips.  I also help find resources for drug and alcohol recovery, because that is a major problem in the homeless community.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: My Aunt and Uncle got me started with a gift certificate for Christmas in 2007.  I love getting updates about the success of kiva patrons.
lenders.occupational_info: I play soccer for the new professional women's soccer league (WPS) in the United States.

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: People have taken chances with me by giving loans to grow my business and I in turn feel I should do the same.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I love

lenders.name: mat
lenders.loan_because: i want people to think i'm benevolent and generous with the good fortune i have been afforded in the this, the first world.
lenders.occupational_info: i work as a mechanic in a small town with one other guy in an even smaller garage. we live day by day off whatever money we can make.

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help other people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My team make websites better.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a weather forecasting organisation. I help put our information on the Internet and mobile phones. My job is to help everyone use our weather information to make decisions about their businesses, their jobs and their lives.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: the greatest thing you can do is help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Social/Cultural Anthropology at university. I've always been interested how different people do different things all around the world. I'd like to do whatever part I can in helping us all come to some understanding and appreciation for one another.

lenders.name: Raphaël
lenders.loan_because: I think it is great to use the internet for such an objective. I hope Kiva-like initiatives will spread for wealth-sharing, the way Wikipedia does for human knowledge sharing.
lenders.occupational_info: My work consists in training small businesses on adapted information and communication technologies (ICT), to increase their efficiency.

lenders.name: Leighton
lenders.loan_because: I don't have time, so I give from the resource I do have.
lenders.occupational_info: I run IT and client reporting for a healthcare consulting ifrm.

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.loan_because: We believe that when you put goodness out into the world, it will come back to you later.  We also believe that everyone in the world should have a chance to make a difference.

lenders.name: margot
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of resources to change lives.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I have been given much and I choose to give to others from that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am deciding what I would like to do. I want to live a life that makes me happy so I am seeing what types of jobs make me happy before I choose one.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable people to help themselves with a hand up so they are better able to support themselves and I believe we are so blessed in Canada that we should give back in some way. We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office doing accounting in finance

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage creative people all over the world, and it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work with troubled youth in a school, now I am involved in church work in a parish.

lenders.name: Leanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: Nothing terribly special...

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research for a law firm, but I would rather be painting. Or sitting on the beach!

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: ...it seemed like a good idea at the time :-)
lenders.occupational_info: Consumer Promotions Management

lenders.name: Ewa
lenders.loan_because: I am delighted that the money goes directly to the budding enterpreneurs in the developing world who are not able to get finance from other sources. The act of lending as opposed to a charitable donation is a statement of trust and empowerement. I think Kiva is a great set up to facilitate this process. And of course small amounts can make a big difference to lives of others. We are all one global village now and the act of lending brings people in diverse cultures toghether.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the City of London dealing with large liabilty claims

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to live in a better world

lenders.name: bybebé
lenders.occupation: Loja de produtos para bebé / Nursery retailer
lenders.loan_because:
Good ideas deserve a chance.

As boas ideias merecem uma oportunidade.
lenders.occupational_info:
bybebé is a leading independent nursery retailer based in Coimbra, Portugal, which offers car seats, strollers, baby clothing and other innovative products for newborns and toddlers.

bybebé é uma loja de produtos para bebé, situada em Coimbra, Portugal, que comercializa carrinhos de bebé, cadeirinhas, roupa de bebé e outros produtos inovadores para bebés e crianças.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: Deep down we all have a desire to help others - this is just one way I like to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am simply passing on some of the blessings God has given me - let Him have the glory.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: My fiancee and I would like to ask our guests of our upcoming wedding to make donations with Kiva rather than registering for personal gifts.
lenders.occupational_info: I forecast stock and currency markets, and my wife, Tracee, is a first grade schoolteacher.

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.occupation: student, dreamer, lover of friends & family
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a dentist.

lenders.name: Trinh
lenders.loan_because: the engine has to start somehow.
lenders.occupational_info: just making a minor difference in the larger world.  But if everyone does it, wouldn't that be major?

lenders.name: Tori
lenders.occupational_info: I help students find information.  I teach students how to find and use information from books and Internet sources. Teach staff and students how to useWEB 2.0

lenders.name: Nathalie & François
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to live on their own, the way they want.

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.loan_because: I truly understand the hardships of entrepreneurship.  I respect those that are willing  and have the ambition to start their own business and I want to help them in any way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a cafe that serves coffee, sandwiches, soup and beer along with a few other things.  I also rent bicycles out for people to ride around town.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Thanks to organizations like Kiva, a little actually can go a long way.

lenders.name: Tanjung Jusuf
lenders.loan_because: i want to help other people, so that they can help other too.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great idea, and it really makes it easy to help a lot of people. I feel like I make a difference.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I am a recovering entrepreneur and want to support the entrepreneurial community.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide information through the internet.

lenders.name: Dustin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone must have a fair chance at achieving their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I write inspirational books on education, philosophy, and diversity. I also write short fiction.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: My donation can make a direct difference.  I can see the result.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in low light portraiture which includes concerts, sports and events.

lenders.name: Abigail
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help make the world a better place for everyone.

lenders.name: The McMiley Foundation
lenders.loan_because: Poverty won't be solved through handouts, it'll be solved by inspiring and helping others to innovate and solve their own problems.

lenders.name: KAUBAU
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a "small" difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Julianna
lenders.loan_because: I'm a lifelong volunteer, and extremely mission-driven!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just a mom who cares about others and is sometimes in a position to help!

lenders.name: Marli
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who are struggling or aiming to lose weight.  I help keep their motivations high & show them that they *CAN* lose weight!

lenders.name: Whitehills Kiva Club
lenders.occupational_info: We are a primary school class consisting of 25 ten and eleven year old boys and girls.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I like to think I contribute in my own small way to other peoples quality of life
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the iside operations of the business, thus allowing the business managers to focus on the outside world, comfortable that fulfillment of  their due dates will not be a problem

lenders.name: Julien
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help at least one time in his life. When you can help, don't hesitate, do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I plan with a team all mechanicals, electricals,... interventions to keep factory equipment  in good condition.

lenders.name: jetty from holland
lenders.loan_because: it is such an easy way to change lives tremendously!
lenders.occupational_info: I love kids therefor I am a babysitter for my profession.

lenders.name: syta
lenders.loan_because: i think after all my experiences abroad it is the best way to help people to achieve their goals or to upgrade their life!

lenders.name: Mario
lenders.loan_because: It is illogical for me not to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: Coming from a developing country, I am acutely aware that poverty is widespread and I was lucky to be born into a well-to-do family there. I want to help others who're less fortunate, particularly those who're trying to build small business enterprises.
lenders.occupational_info: Developed enterprise software system. Currently going for full time master study.

lenders.name: Lillian & Bengt
lenders.loan_because: We want to help espesially women to get a better life for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to support others just as I have been supported in my youth.
lenders.occupational_info: International consulting

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: I am eager to give an assist to people who are interested in making a living through hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to teach wonderful students how to read well, how to write well, but most importantly, how to THINK well.

lenders.name: Brian Niles
lenders.loan_because: The joy of giving and making a positive difference in the lives of others is the least I can do given the blessings and abundance I enjoy on a daily basis.  I thank God for my ability to assist.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a real estate practice through which I help people buy and/or sell homes and property in and around Victoria, British Columbia, Canada

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: In the US, we live in an environment of excess, a throwaway culture. I want to help out people in other countries in a tangible way !
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a team that manages websites for a global cosmetics company.

lenders.name: lavonne
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to see other people succeed, live the dream, nothing is out of reach!
lenders.occupational_info: Suppliers of giant tires for the mining and construction industry.

lenders.name: Roz
lenders.loan_because: In 2010, I am donating on behalf of Prince Edward County's International Women's Day celebration  "Birthing Dreams:  Investing in Women,"  which raised money for Kiva projects.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: Prosperity consciousness is giving consciousness.

lenders.name: ncds3
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: If i didn't loan, I would probably spend the money on something I don't need. This way I feel I can actually help someone

lenders.name: Kamma Narasimha Rao
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing and helping others to improve their lives

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: creating balance in the world is the only way to achieve peace.

lenders.name: Karen & Delfine!
lenders.loan_because: we love, care, and support other humans trying to make their way on this planet.
lenders.occupational_info: Delfine & myself are both working actors in Hollywood, Ca.  See: David Lynch & Alex Cox's soon to be released; REPO CHICK.  Del is a lead and Karen has Co-Star billing.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: We all depend upon each other for a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to school to study the environment so I can make a positive contribution to a sustainable planet.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Giving a hand up beats giving a hand out every time.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: We cannot rely solely on the work of large organizations to invest in the future of humanity. It's up to each of us, individually, to demonstrate our compassion, generosity, and interconnectedness in immediate and direct ways with those struggling to build better lives. These are not hand-outs, they're help-ups.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: God's love for me is reflected in my compassion for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help people settle legal disputes amicably.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I go to University of Wisconsin - Madison and I am in the Army part-time

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Its fun.

lenders.name: Sandeep
lenders.loan_because: I want to stablish my own design studio company.
lenders.occupational_info: I see myself in a work culture that is stimulating, where I can grow and be challenged, in a company that values customer relations, also be associated with a professional team and be responsible for positive impact on organisational growth.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I've seen first-hand microcredit's amazing power to help people lift themselves and each other out of extreme poverty.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people do the things they really want to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a doctor because I have a passion for the human body and I am fasicinated by people and the world we live in as well.

lenders.name: viji
lenders.loan_because: together we can make a difference

lenders.name: Isaiah
lenders.loan_because: I use my birthday and Christmas money to help other people around the world.

lenders.name: Jennie
lenders.loan_because: It's amazing how far just a little bit of money can go in a developing country.
lenders.occupational_info: My work focuses on helping others discover their spiritual selves. Kiva enables me to help in more concrete ways.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I want to see entrepeneurs in other parts of the world have the opportunity to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an experienced senior corporate executive having a second career as a novelist.

lenders.name: Wiley & Debbie
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed. It's a privilege to help others and shares God's blessings to them.
lenders.occupational_info: We perform music for children, schools, families, all ages...styles include jazz, blues, classical and rock.

lenders.name: Candice Lee
lenders.loan_because: I know I can make a difference

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I can help female entrepreneurs become self-sufficient.

lenders.name: Dominique
lenders.loan_because: to quote Bill Gates' mother in a letter to Melinda days before their marriage  "From those to whom much is given, much is expected"
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Coastguard in New Zealand as a fundraiser.

lenders.name: Jake
lenders.loan_because: Empowerment and opportunity are the way to offer hope.  A helping hand is stronger than a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: Diplomacy

lenders.name: Robin & Eddie
lenders.loan_because: We are truly blessed and would like to help others who are not as fortunate. We really like the idea that these loans help people become self sufficient and independent.
lenders.occupational_info: We work for an international computer company that develops software for businesses and individuals.

lenders.name: Albert Muzaurieta
lenders.loan_because: its fun to contribute to small growing businesses that need a small amount of capital.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: it helps

lenders.occupational_info: I help keep Google running.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a health care consulting firm which helps hospitals improve patient care and revenue cycle management.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: I have been in struggling situations myself and have fortunatley had family come to my rescue to help me back on my feet so I could better myself and make a better life for myself and two beautiful daughters.   Though it may not be a lot that I can give to help someone in need, I want to do what I can to help them reach their dream, put a smile on their face!

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: To make a difference.
